session.speaker: Brian Hamilton
session.bio: Brian is an experienced technologist and start up veteran. Working on everything from telephony to cybersecurity to Federal Contracting, Brian has built QA Teams from ground zero, grown existing teams, and is a champion of Quality Best Practices and a Shift Left devotee.
session.title: Shift Left - From Start Up to SAFe
session.abstract: What is Shift Left? How does it work? Time is a constraint when teams try to inject more Quality in their SDLC. Come see how Shift Left can, and has, been implemented in Start Ups to Federal Contracts. All with the goal of making the best use of time and driving down defects.
